git clone https://github.com/hyperledger/indy-sdk.git
cd indy-sdk/
git checkout rc
docker build -f ci/indy-pool.dockerfile -t indy_pool .

apt install php
apt install curl
apt install php-sqlite3
cd Privacy-and-Data-Sovereignty/Authorization-Server/
php -S localhost:8000
curl http://localhost:8000 -d 'grant_type=verifiable_credentials&cred_def_id=NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1'

python3 endorser.py -s
python3 user.py -s
python3 user.py -g


Register client DID
python3 endorser.py -r '{"reqId":1579023661334027416,"identifier":"W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC","operation":{"type":"1","dest":"6R1teTNtFAE1EHLLi9jkoE","verkey":"3x9eNZ3PD52oz1ASFwBm46BxCcqTLSZ8679AfGvNP3z3"},"protocolVersion":2}'

Create credentials definition
python3 endorser.py -d '{"name": "JWT", "version": "1.0", "attributes": ["resource","actions"]}'

Create credential offer
python3 endorser.py -o "NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1"

python3 user.py -c "NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:3:CL:NKpgpotXbEeDY5h7KYGmLE:2:JWT:1.0:TAG1"

Create credential request
python3 user.py -o '{"schema_id":"W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC:2:JWT:1.2","cred_def_id":"W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC:3:CL:W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC:2:JWT:1.2:TAG1","key_correctness_proof":{"c":"22000699151031787999653950363728969874641174984922173663473993301299598077970","xz_cap":"","xr_cap":[["resource",""],["actions",""],["master_secret",""]]},"nonce":"20590483970183162307988"}' -c '{"ver":"1.0","id":"W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC:3:CL:W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC:2:JWT:1.2:TAG1","schemaId":"W6xGRF1zBKGMKYp2cNKasC:2:JWT:1.2","type":"CL","tag":"TAG1","value":{"primary":{"n":"","s":"","r":{"actions":"","resource":"","master_secret":""},"rctxt":"","z":""}}}'
